title: Unrivaled Team Rankings
text:
20262025












































About these plots
Elo ratings are a way of estimating a team’s “true” skill level, invented by Arpad Elo to rank chess players (Wikipedia). The rating system used here is a simplified version of the WNBA ratings system implemented by fivethirtyeight.com. Ratings reset to 1500 at the beginning of the season, since the rosters were redrafted.
